TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TableAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class TableAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class TableAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 将某个类指定为与数据库表相关联的实体类。

span.span: Designates a class as an entity class that is associated with a database table.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用此属性可将类指定为与数据库表或视图关联的实体类。Use this attribute to designate a class as an entity class that is associated with a database table or view. [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 将具有属性的类视为 持久性类。treats classes that have the attribute as persistent classes. [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 仅支持单表映射。supports only single-table mapping. 也就是说，必须将一个实体类只映射到一个数据库表，并且不能同时将一个数据库表映射到多个类。That is, an entity class must be mapped to exactly one database table, and you cannot map a database table to multiple classes at the same time. 您可以使用 属性的属性 指定表的名称，并且可以选择使用架构名称来限定表名称。You can use the property of the attribute to specify a name for the table, and you can optionally use the schema name to qualify a table name. 如果未通过使用属性指定名称 ，则假定表名称与类名称相同。If you do not specify a name by using the property, the table name is assumed to be the same as the class name. ## 架构限定名称Schema-qualified Names 您可以选择使用架构名称来限定表名称。You can optionally use the schema name to qualify a table name. 默认情况下，字符串中第一个句点左侧的标记被 视为架构名称。By default, the token to the left of the first period in the string is considered to be the schema name. 名称的其余部分被视为表名称。The remainder of the name is considered to be the table name. 提供程序会根据需要将表名称括起来。The provider quotes the table name as appropriate. 例如， [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] SQL Server 提供程序可以确保至少在需要的位置使用方括号。For example, the [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] provider for SQL Server makes sure that brackets are used at least where they are needed. > [!NOTE] > 在某些情况下，必须显式引用属性，因为 SQL Server 提供程序无法自动引用。In some cases, you must explicitly quote attributes because the SQL Server provider cannot auto-quote. 下表显示了一些示例。The following table shows some examples. |案例Case|示例：标识符名称Example: Identifier Name|示例：属性中应为字符串Example: Expected String in Attributes|否则 .。。Otherwise…| |----------|------------------------------|--------------------------------------------|----------------| |架构名称包含句点Schema name contains a period|架构： "A. B"Schema: "A.B"

表： "C"Table: "C"|"[A. B]。Ansi-c"[A.B].C"|假定第一个句点将架构名称与表名称分隔开。The first period is assumed to separate the schema name from the table name.| |架构/表名称开头为 `@`Schema/Table name starts with `@`|"@SomeName""@SomeName"|"[@SomeName]""[@SomeName]"|假定为参数名称。Assumed to be a parameter name.| |架构以开头 `[` 并以结尾 `]`Schema starts with `[` and ends with `]`|"[Schema]""[Schema.Table]"|"[[架构]。[表]]] ""[[Schema].[Table]]]"|未加引号的标识符类似于带引号的标识符。The unquoted identifier resembles a quoted identifier.| |表以开头 `[` 并以结尾 `]`Table starts with `[` and ends with `]`|"[表]""[Table]"|"[[Table]]]""[[Table]]]"|未加引号的标识符类似于带引号的标识符。The unquoted identifier resembles a quoted identifier.| ## Examples [!code-csharp[DLinqCustomize#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqCustomize/cs/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DLinqCustomize#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqCustomize/vb/Module1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置表或视图的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the table or view.

value.span: 默认情况下，此值与类名称相同。

span.span: By default, the value is the same as the name of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未使用指定名称 ，则假定表名称与类名相同。If you do not specify a name by using , the table name is assumed to be the same as the class name. > [!NOTE] > 您可以选择使用架构名称来限定表名 (例如，Schema3. Table5) 。You can optionally use a schema name to qualify the table name (for example, Schema3.Table5). 默认情况下，字符串中第一个句点左侧的标记被 视为架构名称，其余的标记为表名。By default, the token to the left of the first period in the string is considered to be the schema name, and the rest to be the table name. 在下面的示例中，默认表名称已 `Customer` 更改为 `Customers` 。In the following example, the default table name, `Customer`, is changed to `Customers`. ## Examples [!code-csharp[DLinqCustomize#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqCustomize/cs/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DLinqCustomize#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqCustomize/vb/Module1.vb#1)]
